analysis.description:
Trustee.grant (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#580-617) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(grants[_to].value == 0)

Trustee.grant (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#580-617) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(grants[_to].value == 0)
Trustee.unlockVestedTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#683-713) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- vested == 0
	- transferable == 0

Reentrancy in StoxSmartTokenSale.distributePartnerTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#770-786):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(stox.totalSupply() == 0) (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#778)
	- issueTokens(0x9065260ef6830f6372F1Bde408DeC57Fe3150530,14800000 * 10 ** 18) (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#785)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isDistributed (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#786)
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#785)

Reentrancy in StoxSmartTokenSale.finalize (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#787-824):
	External calls:
	- stox.issue(0xbC14105ccDdeAadB96Ba8dCE18b40C45b6bACf58,strategicPartnershipTokens) (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#801-806)
	- stox.issue(trustee,unsoldTokens.sub(strategicPartnershipTokens)) (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#807-808)
	- trustee.grant(0xb54c6a870d4aD65e23d471Fb7941aD271D323f5E,unsoldTokens.mul(25).div(100),now,now,now.add(220752000),true) (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#812-815)
	- trustee.grant(0x4eB4Cd1D125d9d281709Ff38d65b99a6927b46c1,unsoldTokens.mul(20).div(100),now,now,now.add(441504000),true) (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#819-822)
	- stox.disableTransfers(false) (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#823-824)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#824)

Reentrancy in Trustee.grant (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#580-617):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(totalVesting.add(_value) <= stox.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#599-600)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- grants (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#601-609)
	- totalVesting (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#612-614)

Trustee.revoke (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#619-631) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-stox.transfer(msg.sender,refund) (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#630)

Trustee.unlockVestedTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#683-713) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-stox.transfer(msg.sender,transferable) (/unique_chucks/1/0x006bea43baa3f7a6f765f14f10a1a1b08334ef45.sol#712-713)
